description: Master port registry for all ProjectsHome services. No two projects share a port.
notes: Dev servers (Vite/Next.js) use dynamic ports assigned by the framework
Crown & Conquer (frontier-bastion): Vite assigns port dynamically (usually 5173)
E2EE Messenger: Next.js assigns port dynamically (usually 3000)
Harmony Medspa: Expo/Vite assigns port dynamically
Polymarket BTC Assistant: Console app, no HTTP server
Solana Bot: Dev server, dynamic port
Profit Desk: Console app, no HTTP server
Trading Profit Engine: Orchestrator, depends on master-trade-bot (4000) and profit-desk
